const double pi=acos(-1.0);
ll power(ll a, ll b) {
	ll x=1,y=a;
	while(b>0) {
		if(b&1) x=x*y;
		y=y*y;
		b/=2;
	}
	return x;
}
int main() {
	ll n,j,k,sol,x;
	Sl(n);
	ll a[n+1];
	ll ans[n+1];
	ans[0]=ans[1]=0;
	a[0]=0;
	F(i,1,n+1) Sl(a[i]);
	F(i,2,n+1) {
		sol=LLONG_MAX;
		x=1;
		j=0;
		for(;i-x>0;) {
			sol=min(sol,abs(a[i]-a[i-x])+ans[i-x]);
			j++;
			x=power(2,j);
		}
		ans[i]=sol;
	}
	printf("%lld\n",ans[n]);
    return 0;
}
